Kola eapa, nil eapa, rathueapa, api hama gamakinma  adasita patangamu, rata rekiya  athaherala  api eanawa. Api  diyasen kumareku pathkaragamu. Sinhala jathiya, agama, rata rekageneemata  perata eamu. Jathiwadee nethi  temil, muslim   katholika api  eakata  sitagamu. Rathna himiyane   srilankika jathiya  paksaya  pihituwagamu.

comments.comment: Pudhuma jaathiwaadhee kathawak sulu jaatheenge aythiwaasikam searama nethi karala oba thuma bala poraththuwana sathuta mokakdha haamudhuruwane? Oba thuma Sri lankawata sewaya karanawanam lankawe inna hema jaathiyak genama balanna oni. Ek jaathiyak gena witharak balanna epa. Oba thuma ei apiwa paaganna hadhanne? Api hemoma thrasthawadheen nemei. Lankawe muslim warun athara ithaama sulu pirisak thamai thrasthawadheen kiyala elluwe. Oba thuma ei apith ekka mechchara krodhen?
comments.author: Fathima Hassna

replies.replyComment: @prasad ramesh awurudhu 13 lamainwa kasadha bendhala dhennethi hindha thamai prema sambandhakam ethi karaganne. Kolloth ekka penala yanne. E wage dhewal mama athdhekeemen dhekala thiyenne. Ewa hondhai nedha. Oba thuma apita muslim ratakata yanna wisa hadhala dhenawanam api yannam

@Fathima Hassna lankawe sharia neethiyata  wada karanawata api kamathi na, ehema wada karanna onenam oyala muslim ratakata yanna, awrudu dahathune lamiwa kasada badinna denna ba lankawa asse , muslim, buddhist katholic pasal nawaththala mishra pasal athi karanna one, oyala monawa andath apita kamak na burka nathuwa, mokada burka andama muhuna penena, lankawa kiyanne sinhala buddist ratak sinhala api muslim ratakata giyoth ewala neethi walata garukaranna onane eka nisa oyala ape neethi walata garukaranna nathnam karunakarala muslim ratakata yanna apita wada dennathuwa

@lahiru hettiarachchi hemoma ekama paasalata yanna oni, ekama nila endhuma andhinna oni, ekama widhihata wiwaaha neethi, ekama bank thiyenna oni kiyala methuma kiyanawa. Muslim warun hetiyata apita samahara aagamika prathipaththi thiyenawa. Apita poliya ganna thahanam eka ape mahansiya nethuwa nikang lebena nisa. oyala poliya gannawa. Apita kotata shareeraya winiwidha pena widhihata endhum andhinna thahanam. Eken godak sthree dhooshana wagema eka piriminge belma nomaga yawana nisa. Oyalage samaharu ehema andhinawa. Ape wiwaahaka krama wenas. Wiwaahayata kaling ho wiwaahayen pasu gehenu pirimi aniyam sambandhatha ethi kara geneema walakwannai ehema neethi thiyenne. Oyalage wiwaaha krama wenas. Oyalage krama oyalage prathipaththi anuwa oyala pilipadhinawa ekata mama weradhdhak kiyanne ne. E wagema ape prathipaththi anuwa apith jeewath wenna kemathiy. Ewa nethi kireemen ape janathaawa thamai peedawata pathwenne. Ehema kireemen ape aythiwaasikam nethi karannai methuma hadhanne. Anika methuma kiwwa ape 7 dhenek bandhinawa kiyala. Eka methumage nodhenuwathkama kiyalai mama hithanne. Mokadha 7 dhenek bandhinna kiyala ape aagame kiyala ne. Yam aagamak gena katha karanna kaling e gena hondhata awabodhayak kara geneema thamai budhdhimathkama.
Me kiyana kathawen sulu jaathinge aithiwasikam nethi wenne kohomada
